Package io.opentelemetry.trace

Class TracingContextUtils

java.lang.Object
io.opentelemetry.trace.TracingContextUtils
@Immutable
public final class TracingContextUtils
extends Object
Util methods/functionality to interact with the Context.
Since:
0.1.0

  • Method Summary

    static io.opentelemetry.context.Scope currentContextWith​(Span span)
    Returns a new Scope encapsulating the provided Span added to the current Context.
    static Span getCurrentSpan()
    Returns the Span from the current Context, falling back to a default, no-op Span.

    Returns the Span from the specified Context, falling back to a default, no-op Span.

      context - the parent Context.

    • getSpan

      public static Span getSpan​(io.grpc.Context context)

      Returns:
      the Span from the specified Context.

    • getSpanWithoutDefault

      @Nullable public static Span getSpanWithoutDefault​(io.grpc.Context context)

      Parameters:
      context - the specified Context.
      Returns:
      the Span from the specified Context.

    • currentContextWith

      public static io.opentelemetry.context.Scope currentContextWith​(Span span)
      Returns a new Scope encapsulating the provided Span added to the current Context.
      Parameters:
      span - the Span to be added to the current Context.
      Returns:
      the Scope for the updated Context.
      Since:
      0.1.0
